thread.title: Real Madrid Survives and Advances to Champions League Final

author: Joshua Robinson
title: Real Madrid Survives and Advances to Champions League Final
text:
MADRID—The shrill, piercing whistle of nearly 90,000 Real Madrid fans went on for minutes at a time. It filled the cavernous Santiago Bernabeu Stadium here and rang in the ears of the players—Bayern Munich as it desperately sought one more goal, Real Madrid as it clung on to its advantage.
Then, drowned out by the noise, the referee blew the only whistle that mattered and half the men on the field collapsed to the ground. Real had hung on to the 2-2 draw that, combined with a 2-1 victory in the first leg, sent the two-time...
